title: Confounding by geography and anticoagulant compromises proposed ALS diagnostic model and biomarkers: Re-analysis of Chia et al. (2025)
description: Comprehensive reanalysis demonstrating severe confounding between plasma collection tube type, geographic origin, and diagnosis in an ALS biomarker study published in Nature Medicine. This repository includes: (1) leave-country-out cross-validation showing 18.2% performance drop, (2) stratified differential analysis revealing only 26.9% protein replication across cohorts, (3) identification of 22 tube-robust biomarker candidates, and (4) complete reproducible pipeline.
notes: This reanalysis uses the publicly available dataset from Chia et al. (2025) Zenodo deposit (https://zenodo.org/records/16899551). The raw data is NOT included in this repository - users must download it from the original source. All analysis code, test suite, and documentation are provided for full reproducibility.
